emailTemplate.name: media_comment_notifyowners
emailTemplate.subject: $core_v2_gallery.Current.Name - new comment: $email_utility.RenderText($core_v2_mediaComment.Current.Subject)
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($comment = $core_v2_mediaComment.Current) #set($media = $core_v2_media.Current) #set($gallery = $core_v2_gallery.Current)
$media.Title: new comment
Current status: #if(!$comment.IsApproved)Not#end published
By $comment.Author.DisplayName

$email_utility.RenderHtml($comment.Body)

View the media gallery item online.
To unsubscribe from only this thread, disable email notifications online.

Flag this comment as spam/abuse.
emailTemplate.textBody:
#set($comment = $core_v2_mediaComment.Current) #set($media = $core_v2_media.Current) #set($gallery = $core_v2_gallery.Current)
Commenter: $comment.Author.DisplayName Media gallery item: $email_utility.RenderHtml($media.Title) Link: $core_v2_mediaUrls.Media($media.Id) Current status: #if(!$comment.IsApproved)Not#end published
$email_utility.RenderText($comment.Body)
-- You were sent this email because you opted to receive email notifications when someone created a comment on $gallery.Name. To unsubscribe, visit $core_v2_mediaUrls.Media($media.Id).
